pullRequest.bodyText:

commit.message: fix(TBD-11491): missing dependency for kinesis streaming (#1688)

nodes.bodyText: it must be added by spark-streaming-* lib since it's BASE and amazon-kinesis-client is marked as Compile dependency. So it must come with spark-streaming lib. I don't mind about this fix but fix just add the lib that had to be added, seems to be a workaround of an unknown issue (or env issues), not a complete fix. Just a warning
